name: Ironhide
entries: Swords crash down on invisible forces, halting their strikes. Armor clad infantry are sent through the air with just a thought. As the world of mortals modernized, covering themselves in metal, so did some rare Sorcerers.  Let their reliance on Iron be their downfall.

You have a magical affinity to metals. You bend and control magnetic forces with ease. Ironhide Sorcerers have become a rare and valuable member to any front line, with their ability to bend barriers, crush armorclad soldiers and launch waves of jagged metal at their enemies.
